value.title: Is This a Good Time to Become a Power BI Consultant? Really? ü§î
value.excerpt: Is this really a good time to become a Power BI Consultant? Becoming an independent Power BI Consultant can be a path to make an impact, do what you love and create a life by your own rules. And surprisingly, some factors may make this the best time to take action. Watch the video to learn more  ‚ûî Links
